Single Replication from the Simulation Study

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

Source: vignettes/sim-rep.Rmd
sim-rep.Rmd
library(manMetaVAR)

Data Generation 

seed <- 1
set.seed(seed)
data <- GenData(taskid = taskid)
plot(data)

summary(data)
#>        id             time             y1               y2        
#>  Min.   :  1.0   Min.   :  0.0   Min.   :-4.244   Min.   :-8.366  
#>  1st Qu.: 63.0   1st Qu.: 62.0   1st Qu.: 2.502   1st Qu.: 1.093  
#>  Median :125.5   Median :124.5   Median : 3.829   Median : 2.529  
#>  Mean   :125.5   Mean   :124.5   Mean   : 3.906   Mean   : 2.618  
#>  3rd Qu.:188.0   3rd Qu.:187.0   3rd Qu.: 5.233   3rd Qu.: 4.025  
#>  Max.   :250.0   Max.   :249.0   Max.   :12.180   Max.   :13.001

MetaVAR 

dtvar <- FitDTVAR(data, ncores = parallel::detectCores())
summary(dtvar, means = TRUE)
#>     beta_11     beta_21     beta_12     beta_22     alpha_1     alpha_2 
#>  0.30704102 -0.06024832 -0.04756774  0.32197360  2.74854148  1.91720148 
#>      psi_11      psi_21      psi_22    theta_11    theta_22 
#>  1.10385193  0.55361783  1.27545012  0.36328920  0.41597974
